title: international law relates
extract: International law is the set of rules generally regarded and accepted in relations between nations. ... International law is consent-based governance. This means that a state member may choose to not abide by international law, and even to break its treaty. This is an issue of state sovereignty.
extract_html: International law is the set of rules generally regarded and accepted in relations between nations. ... International law is consent-based governance. This means that a state member may choose to not abide by international law, and even to break its treaty. This is an issue of state sovereignty.
